sql_templates.device_id_query: SELECT id, customer_id FROM oil.t_device WHERE device_code = %s ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1
sql_templates.customer_query: SELECT customer_name FROM oil.t_customer WHERE id = %s
sql_templates.inventory_query: SELECT * FROM oil.t_inventory WHERE device_id = %s AND create_time BETWEEN %s AND %s ORDER BY create_time DESC
sql_templates.refueling_details_query: SELECT * FROM oil.t_refueling_detail WHERE device_id = %s AND create_time BETWEEN %s AND %s ORDER BY create_time ASC
